tool_description: Makes intelligent bitrate switching decisions based on network conditions, device capabilities, and playback performance to optimize streaming quality.

current_bandwidth_kbps.description: Current measured bandwidth in kilobits per second

device_max_bitrate.description: Device maximum recommended bitrate in kbps

minimum_buffer_threshold.description: Minimum buffer seconds before quality reduction

error_messages: Invalid bandwidth values: current_bandwidth_kbps must be positive
Invalid stability score: bandwidth_stability must be between 0.0 and 10.0
Invalid bitrate values: All bitrate parameters must be positive integers
Invalid buffer health: buffer_health_seconds must be non-negative
Empty available bitrates: Provide at least 2 bitrate options
Invalid buffer threshold: minimum_buffer_threshold must be positive
usage: Provide current network and playback metrics along with available bitrate options. The tool returns optimal bitrate switching recommendations.

recommended_bitrate.description: Recommended bitrate in kbps for next segment
